name: SCNRenderingAPI
desc: Options for choosing the graphics technology for an SCNView object (or other SceneKit renderer) to use for drawing its contents. Used by the renderingAPI property and the preferredRenderingAPI option when initializing an SCNView object.

items.name: case metal
items.desc: Use the Metal framework for SceneKit rendering.

items.name: case openGLES2
items.desc: Use the OpenGL ES 2.0 API for SceneKit rendering in iOS.

items.name: case openGLLegacy
items.desc: Use the Legacy OpenGL API for SceneKit rendering in macOS.

items.name: case openGLCore32
items.desc: Use the OpenGL 3.2 Core Profile API for SceneKit rendering in macOS.

items.name: case openGLCore41
items.desc: Use the OpenGL 4.1 Core Profile API for SceneKit rendering in macOS.
